original: rang gi ngo bo phan tshun tha dad pa dag la sgra tha mi dad pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo phan tshun tha dad pa dag la sgra tha mi dad pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ram /
translated: The reason for applying the term wind to that which is different in nature is not understood because the term wind is applied to that which is different in nature.

original: thams cad du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nges tshig med pa'i phyir 'dri ba ni ci'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nges tshig med pa'i phyir 'dri ba ni ci'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o //
translated: The answer is: because it lacks the etymology that will be explained later.

original: gzugs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni gnod pa byar rung zhes bya ba 'di la shes byed kyi khungs ni don gyi sde tshan dag las mdo gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni gnod pa byar rung zhes bya ba 'di la shes byed kyi khungs ni don gyi sde tshan dag las mdo gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “capable of materiality” means “capable of being harmed.” The source for this explanation is the sutra in the section on the meaning class.

original: 'di la dper brjod pa ni ;
analyzed: 'di la dper brjod pa ni ;
translated: The example is:

original: zug rngus zug bzhin gnod par 'gyur //
analyzed: zug rngus zug bzhin gnod par 'gyur //
translated: “It is harmed as if by an arrow.”

original: zhes bya ba 'di yin te gnod pa'i gnas su gzugs su rung ba'i sgrar sbyar ba'i phyir ro //🔽gal te zug rngus zug pa la sems pa dang bcas pas zug rngus bsnun pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gnod par 'gyur ba dang gnod pa tshol bar byed pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di yin te gnod pa'i gnas su gzugs su rung ba'i sgrar sbyar ba'i phyir ro // gal te zug rngus zug pa la sems pa dang bcas pas zug rngus bsnun pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gnod par 'gyur ba dang gnod pa tshol bar byed pa la /
translated: The word “materiality” is applied to the state of being harmed.🔽If one is pierced by an arrow and feels pain, one is harmed by the suffering that arises from being struck by the arrow and one seeks to be relieved of the pain.

original: de'i tshor ba'i 'dod pa la gnod pa byas pas bskyed pas gnod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rigs na /
analyzed: de'i tshor ba'i 'dod pa la gnod pa byas pas bskyed pas gnod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rigs na /
translated: If one is harmed by the desire for the feeling, the harm is produced by the desire.

original: gzugs ni sems can ma yin pas sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: gzugs ni sems can ma yin pas sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Form does not suffer because it is not a sentient being.

original: yang na gzugs skad cig ma yin pa nyid kyis gnod pa byed pa'i dus med pa'i phyir gnod pa gang zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: yang na gzugs skad cig ma yin pa nyid kyis gnod pa byed pa'i dus med pa'i phyir gnod pa gang zhig yod ce na /
translated: Or, since form is momentary, there is no time for it to be harmed. What harm is there?

original: de'i phyir yongs su gyur pa bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su gyur pa bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “it generates a transformation.”

original: rgyun gyi dbang du byas nas yin gyi skad cig gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyun gyi dbang du byas nas yin gyi skad cig gis ni ma yin no //
translated: This is from the perspective of a continuum, not from the perspective of a moment.

original: yongs su 'gyur ba ni gzhan du 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: yongs su 'gyur ba ni gzhan du 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: Transformation is the occurrence of something else.

original: mi 'dra ba yongs su 'gyur ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba ste snga ma dang mi 'dra ba nyid du @57b bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'dra ba yongs su 'gyur ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba ste snga ma dang mi 'dra ba nyid du @57b bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: A transformation that is different is a transformation that generates something different from the prior state.

original: gzugs su rung ba ni thogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gegs so //
analyzed: gzugs su rung ba ni thogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gegs so //
translated: That which is suitable as form is obstructive.

original: gang gi phyir sngon gyi las goms pa las dpyad na gzugs kha dog ngan pa dang kha dog bzang po aanti ye yam tshad mas rtogs par bya ba au dakro dha na bha bta yu ba n'a hi zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mthar phyin pa'am dngos po la mngon
analyzed: gang gi phyir sngon gyi las goms pa las dpyad na gzugs kha dog ngan pa dang kha dog bzang po aanti ye yam tshad mas rtogs par bya ba au dakro dha na bha bta yu ba n'a hi zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mthar phyin pa'am dngos po la mngon
translated: Because it is analyzed from the habitual tendencies of past karma, it is understood by valid knowledge that form has an unpleasant color or a pleasant color.🔽Because it is analyzed by the ultimate or by the thing itself, it is said, “Venerable one, since your faculties are clear, you have realized a little nectar.”

original: bar dpyad pas gzugs byartha tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rab tu dang ba las na khyod kyis bdud rtsi cung zad rtogs so zhes gsungs pas so zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
analyzed: bar dpyad pas gzugs byartha tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rab tu dang ba las na khyod kyis bdud rtsi cung zad rtogs so zhes gsungs pas so zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
translated: This is stated by the master Samghabhadra.

original: 'di ni sems can du ston pa dang bstan du yod pa nyid kyi steng nges pa'i tshig kyang gzugs can ma yin pa thams cad la med pa'i phyir gzugs can kho na la de'i don srid do zhes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni sems can du ston pa dang bstan du yod pa nyid kyi steng nges pa'i tshig kyang gzugs can ma yin pa thams cad la med pa'i phyir gzugs can kho na la de'i don srid do zhes pa yin no //
translated: This is because the meaning of form is possible only for form, since the terms “indicative” and “having resistance” do not exist for anything nonphysical.

original: gzugs kyi nges pa'i tshig gang la yin pa de kho na la de'i don las gzugs bstan par 'gyur gyi gzhan las ma yin zhes so //🔽skyon de nyid du thal ba'am de'i rigs yin pa'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos can do she ai ti tse ta bstan du yod pa dang bstan du med pa dag rigs mtshungs pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi nges pa'i tshig gang la yin pa de kho na la de'i don las gzugs bstan par 'gyur gyi gzhan las ma yin zhes so // skyon de nyid du thal ba'am de'i rigs yin pa'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos can do she ai ti tse ta bstan du yod pa dang bstan du med pa dag rigs mtshungs pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.

original: yod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos can mig la sogs pa'i rigs nyid rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi rigs yongs su bzung ba la yang 'byung pa rnams gzugs nyid du mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dir de'i shes byed bshad pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang ma 'brel ba nyid de /
analyzed: yod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos can mig la sogs pa'i rigs nyid rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi rigs yongs su bzung ba la yang 'byung pa rnams gzugs nyid du mi 'gyur ro // 'dir de'i shes byed bshad pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang ma 'brel ba nyid de /
translated: The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.🔽The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal root ru means to be seen.

original: bde bar gshegs pa ba'i nges pa'i tshig ma yin no //🔽de skad ces rgol ba la thams cad du bra ti bidh'a noktra /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa ba'i nges pa'i tshig ma yin no //🔽de skad ces rgol ba la thams cad du bra ti bidh'a noktra /
translated: The verbal root ruci means to appear, and the verbal

original: 'o na ni rdul phra rab ces bya ba la gal te gzugs su rung ba yongs su 'gyur ba bskyed pa dang thogs pa yin na ni gnyi ga ltar yang gzugs su mi 'gyur te cha shas med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni rdul phra rab ces bya ba la gal te gzugs su rung ba yongs su 'gyur ba bskyed pa dang thogs pa yin na ni gnyi ga ltar yang gzugs su mi 'gyur te cha shas med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the so-called subtle atom generates a transformation that is capable of material form and is obstructive, then it is not material form in either case, because it is partless.

original: de ni ji ltar blta bar mi nus pa de bzhin du lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis reg par yang mi nus te yongs su 'gyur ba yang ma yin la thogs pa yang ma yin snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar blta bar mi nus pa de bzhin du lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis reg par yang mi nus te yongs su 'gyur ba yang ma yin la thogs pa yang ma yin snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: Just as it is not possible to see it, so too it is not possible to touch it with contact by hand, etc. It is not a transformation and it is not obstructive.

original: 'di na rdzas kyi rdul phra rab la mngon par 'dod kyi 'dus pa'i rdul phra rab ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di na rdzas kyi rdul phra rab la mngon par 'dod kyi 'dus pa'i rdul phra rab ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the subtle atom of substance is asserted, not the subtle atom of aggregation.

original: de ni rdzas brgyad pa yin pas gzugs su rung bar mi 'gal lo //🔽de nyid kyi phyir rdul phra rab kyi rdzas gcig logs shig @58a * //
analyzed: de ni rdzas brgyad pa yin pas gzugs su rung bar mi 'gal lo // de nyid kyi phyir rdul phra rab kyi rdzas gcig logs shig @58a * //
translated: Because it is an aggregation of eight substances, it is not contradictory that it is capable of material form.

original: tu gyur ba ni med pa nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: tu gyur ba ni med pa nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: For that very reason, it is said that a single substance of a subtle atom does not exist separately.

original: 'dod na dbang po med pa dang // sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
analyzed: 'dod na dbang po med pa dang // sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
translated: If one wishes, one can say that the subtle particle, which is without sense faculty and without sound, is composed of eight substances.

original: ces bya ba la sogs par nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs par nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is determined in this way and so forth.

original: 'dus pa la gnas pa de ni gzugs su rung ba nyid do /
analyzed: 'dus pa la gnas pa de ni gzugs su rung ba nyid do /
translated: That which is situated in the composite is capable of materiality.

original: gzugs su rung ba'am thogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs su rung ba'am thogs pa yin no //
translated: It is capable of materiality or obstruction.

original: gzhan dag ni rdul phra rab logs su gyur te yod pa nyid kyang gzugs su rung ba'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rdul phra rab logs su gyur te yod pa nyid kyang gzugs su rung ba'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the subtle particle, which is separate and existent, is capable of materiality.

original: so so'i rnam par rig byed bskyed ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: so so'i rnam par rig byed bskyed ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not generate individual informative form,

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po rnams ni bsags pa la brten nas dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po rnams ni bsags pa la brten nas dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the five collections of consciousness have as their object that which is accumulated.

original: 'di ltar yul nges pa med pa rnams thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo yang thogs pa dang bcas par 'dod de /
analyzed: 'di ltar yul nges pa med pa rnams thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo yang thogs pa dang bcas par 'dod de /
translated: Thus, even though the objects that are not determined as to place are of the nature of nonobstruction, they are held to be obstructed.

original: de rnams thogs pa'i ngo bor yod pa byas nas gzugs rnams de ltar rtog par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams thogs pa'i ngo bor yod pa byas nas gzugs rnams de ltar rtog par bya'o //
translated: Having made them of the nature of obstruction, one should understand form in that way.

original: 'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa zhes pa zhes bya ba la yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir gnod pa byar rung ba ma yin zhing thogs pa ma yin te gzugs can ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa zhes pa zhes bya ba la yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir gnod pa byar rung ba ma yin zhing thogs pa ma yin te gzugs can ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: But if you think that past and future form do not exist as obstructive, because they do not exist in a present place, then they are not form, because they are not obstructive.

original: de yang gzugs su yod zin pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de yang gzugs su yod zin pa dang zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'o //
translated: That which has already existed as form is past.

original: gzugs su yod par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa skye ba'i rgyu'i chos can no //
analyzed: gzugs su yod par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa skye ba'i rgyu'i chos can no //
translated: That which will exist as form is future, because it is the dharma that is the cause of arising.

original: de dang rigs mthun pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs su yod par gyur pa dang rigs mthun pa mi skye ba'i chos can la 'dod de bud shing bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang rigs mthun pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs su yod par gyur pa dang rigs mthun pa mi skye ba'i chos can la 'dod de bud shing bzhin no //
translated: That which is similar to it is the future dharma that is not produced, because it is similar to that which has existed as form, like fuel.

original: dper na shing la sogs pa 'bud bzhin pa ma yin pa la yang bud shing du brjod de /
analyzed: dper na shing la sogs pa 'bud bzhin pa ma yin pa la yang bud shing du brjod de /
translated: For example, even that which is not burning is called fuel, like wood, etc.

original: de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir bud shing yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin no //
analyzed: de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir bud shing yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin no //
translated: Because it is similar to that which is burning, it is fuel. It is the same here.

original: 'o na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzugs ma yin par 'gyur te de dang rigs mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhen /
analyzed: 'o na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzugs ma yin par 'gyur te de dang rigs mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhen /
translated: Nonindicative form would not be form because it is not homogeneous with it and it is not impeded.

original: rnam par rig byed rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs dang rigs mthun pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs dang rigs mthun pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it homogeneous with form because it is homogeneous with form that is derived from indication?

original: de nyid legs par dpyad na 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos po ni ji ltar yul na mi gnas zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: de nyid legs par dpyad na 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos po ni ji ltar yul na mi gnas zhes bya'o ;
translated: If you analyze that, how can you say that a thing derived from the cause of the great elements does not exist in a place?

original: / de yang rnam par rig byed la gzugs yod pa'i phyir gzugs su yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: / de yang rnam par rig byed la gzugs yod pa'i phyir gzugs su yod par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, nonindicative form would not exist as form because form exists in indication.

original: shing ljon pa g-yos pas grib ma g-yo ba bzhin no //
analyzed: shing ljon pa g-yos pas grib ma g-yo ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the movement of a tree causing the movement of its shadow.

original: nye bar 'jal ba dang dper brjod pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma yin te //
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba dang dper brjod pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma yin te //
translated: This analogy and example are not similar.

original: shes pas shes byed 'jal ba ba lang gis ba men bzhin no //
analyzed: shes pas shes byed 'jal ba ba lang gis ba men bzhin no //
translated: Knowledge is like a cow that measures the object to be measured by a cow.

original: de ltar na @58b grib ma g-yos pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na @58b grib ma g-yos pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus the movement of a shadow and nonindicative form are not similar.

original: dper brjod pa 'dir gang dper brjod pa dang sgrub byed kyi phyir bstan pa'i ngag 'di 'dir sgrub byed kyi chos ci yin /
analyzed: dper brjod pa 'dir gang dper brjod pa dang sgrub byed kyi phyir bstan pa'i ngag 'di 'dir sgrub byed kyi chos ci yin /
translated: What is the property to be established in this example of the statement that teaches the reason?

original: rab tu sbyor ba du ma bsdus pa'i don ni rab tu sbyor ba'i ngag ma yin la /
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba du ma bsdus pa'i don ni rab tu sbyor ba'i ngag ma yin la /
translated: The meaning of the collection of many applications is not the statement of application.

original: rab tu sbyor ba'i ngag ni rang gi rten gyur pa la sgrub par byed pa ste rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la brten pa'i phyir grib ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba'i ngag ni rang gi rten gyur pa la sgrub par byed pa ste rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la brten pa'i phyir grib ma bzhin no //
translated: The statement of application is the proof that is based on its support, like a shadow, because it is based on nonindicative form.

original: yang na rnam par rig byed thams cad la brten pa'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: yang na rnam par rig byed thams cad la brten pa'i dbang du byas te /
translated: Or, in general, it is based on all indicative form.

original: gzugs rjes su rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu la brten pa'i phyir ljon shing bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs rjes su rnam par 'gyur ba'i rgyu la brten pa'i phyir ljon shing bzhin no //
translated: It is like a tree because it is based on the cause of subsequent form.

original: bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par reg byed la mi ltos pa yin yang de'i rigs can yin pa'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes rgya cher 'byung ba la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par reg byed la mi ltos pa yin yang de'i rigs can yin pa'i phyir 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes rgya cher 'byung ba la /
translated: The absorption and uncontaminated vows that are nonindicative states do not depend on tactile objects, but they are not called “unchanging” because they are of that type.

original: kha cig na re dam bca'i khyad par 'di ni gzugs la med do //🔽'gyur ba zhes pa de'i phyir 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te rnam par rig byed 'gyur ba ni de rig byed ma yin pa yang ma yin //
analyzed: kha cig na re dam bca'i khyad par 'di ni gzugs la med do // 'gyur ba zhes pa de'i phyir 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te rnam par rig byed 'gyur ba ni de rig byed ma yin pa yang ma yin //
translated: Some say: This special vow does not exist for form.🔽Because it is said to be transformation, it is said thus: Transformation of indicative form is not nonindicative form.

original: rnam par rig byed gyur na mi 'gyur bas zhes so //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed gyur na mi 'gyur bas zhes so //
translated: If indicative form transforms, it would not be nonindicative form.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te gang gi phyir gzugs su rung ba lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis gzhan du bskyed pa de yang thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa der dngos su mi 'gyur
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te gang gi phyir gzugs su rung ba lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis gzhan du bskyed pa de yang thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa der dngos su mi 'gyur
translated: That is not so, because if form is suitable to be changed by contact with hands, feet, and so on, then since it would not be impeded, it would not be nonindicative form.

original: bas de'i phyir rnam par rig byed kyi phyis khas blangs pa de 'di ltar dgag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bas de'i phyir rnam par rig byed kyi phyis khas blangs pa de 'di ltar dgag par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since it is not directly that, one should not refute the assertion that it is indicative form.

original: mi 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes pa khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes pa khyad par med pa'o //
translated: The reason “because it does not transform” is not specific.

original: 'gram lcag dang thal mo dang 'bru la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i khyad par yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir gzhan gzugs su rung ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par 'gyur ba ni rnam par rig byed kyi
analyzed: 'gram lcag dang thal mo dang 'bru la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i khyad par yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir gzhan gzugs su rung ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par 'gyur ba ni rnam par rig byed kyi
translated: But the slap, the palm, the grain, etc., do not have a different non-informative form, and therefore the definition of the other, namely, “that which is capable of materiality and is not capable of materiality,” is not applicable to the non-informative.

original: phyi nas dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag la'o zhes bshad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi nas dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag la'o zhes bshad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the expression “in the future and in the non-informative” would not be justified.

original: shing ljon pa la ni yal ga dang lo ma la sogs pa'i chung ba dang 'phel ba dang grib ma chung ba dang 'phel bar 'gyur bas shing ljon pa g-yos pas grib ma g-yos pa mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: shing ljon pa la ni yal ga dang lo ma la sogs pa'i chung ba dang 'phel ba dang grib ma chung ba dang 'phel bar 'gyur bas shing ljon pa g-yos pas grib ma g-yos pa mi 'gal lo //
translated: But the shadow of a tree moves when the tree moves, because the shadow is smaller or larger according to whether the tree is covered with leaves or is leafless, and according to whether the leaves are extended or contracted.

original: de bzhin du sgrub byed la skyon bshad pa yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgrub byed la skyon bshad pa yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is the fault in the proof?

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid de /🔽gang gyur pas gang la gyur pa'i dngos po de dag rten dang @59a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid de / gang gyur pas gang la gyur pa'i dngos po de dag rten dang @59a * //
translated: The reason is unestablished.

original: brten pa'i dngos por med de /
analyzed: brten pa'i dngos por med de /
translated: The things that are the basis and the based do not exist as things that are the cause of the arising of the other.

original: dper na shing ba l'a sha dang de'i grib ma bzhin /
analyzed: dper na shing ba l'a sha dang de'i grib ma bzhin /
translated: For example, it is like a bhallataka tree and its shadow.

original: yang na khas blangs pa'i dh'i dh'am rgol bar byed de /🔽rnam par rig byed gyur kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin ba la ji ltar g-yeng ba rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir spyir btang ba khas blangs pas rnam por rig byed kyi gzugs las rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs sel bar byed de /
analyzed: yang na khas blangs pa'i dh'i dh'am rgol bar byed de / rnam par rig byed gyur kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin ba la ji ltar g-yeng ba rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir spyir btang ba khas blangs pas rnam por rig byed kyi gzugs las rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs sel bar byed de /
translated: Or, the opponent’s position is accepted and then refuted.🔽Even though the opponent’s position is accepted, in general, nonindicative form is distinguished from indicative form because distraction is engaged in nonindicative form.

original: rnam bar rig byed log na zhes so //
analyzed: rnam bar rig byed log na zhes so //
translated: If indicative form ceases, nonindicative form would also cease.

original: 'dir yang gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'dir yang gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: Here, the reason is not established.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par rig byed la brten pa ma yin zhing de log na do ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par rig byed la brten pa ma yin zhing de log na do ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: Nonindicative form does not depend on indicative form and it does not cease when that ceases.

original: bzlog pas grib ma rnam par rig byed ae kshi ra kshi byed pa la yang sgrub byed brjod par bya ba ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: bzlog pas grib ma rnam par rig byed ae kshi ra kshi byed pa la yang sgrub byed brjod par bya ba ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
translated: The reversal of the example of a shadow and indicative form is easy to understand, so it is not explained.

original: yang na grib ma song ba nyid kyis rten log na bzlog pas khyab ces bya ba la rnam par rig byed log na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzlog ces bya ba ste /🔽'dod pa la gnod byed 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: yang na grib ma song ba nyid kyis rten log na bzlog pas khyab ces bya ba la rnam par rig byed log na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzlog ces bya ba ste / 'dod pa la gnod byed 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is the contradiction that refutes the assertion that when indicative form is reversed, nonindicative form is reversed.

original: 'gal bar mthong ba ma yin te de las gzhan du khas blangs la gnod pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'gal bar mthong ba ma yin te de las gzhan du khas blangs la gnod pa nyid de /
translated: The opponent does not see the contradiction, but it is contradictory to accept that.

original: re zhig dper brjod khas blangs nas skyon med pa dang dpe la yang skyon med do //
analyzed: re zhig dper brjod khas blangs nas skyon med pa dang dpe la yang skyon med do //
translated: First, the opponent accepts the example and then claims that there is no fault.🔽The example is not faulty because the basis of the shadow is similar to the shadow.

original: rten gyur na gyur par 'dra ba'i phyir dpe nyid kyang rnam par rig byed gyur na yang ma gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i dpe ma yin par grib ma zhes ston par byed de /
analyzed: rten gyur na gyur par 'dra ba'i phyir dpe nyid kyang rnam par rig byed gyur na yang ma gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i dpe ma yin par grib ma zhes ston par byed de /
translated: The example of the shadow is not an example of nonindicative form because when indicative form is reversed, nonindicative form is not reversed.

original: rnam par rig byed log na yang de ma log la de gyur na yang ma gyur ro zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed log na yang de ma log la de gyur na yang ma gyur ro zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that when indicative form is reversed, nonindicative form is not reversed and when indicative form changes, nonindicative form does not change.

original: kha cig na re rnam par rig byed gyur pa las gyur pa ni rnam par rig byed nyid do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re rnam par rig byed gyur pa las gyur pa ni rnam par rig byed nyid do zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say: That which is derived from the transformation of indicative form is indicative form.

original: 'di ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par rig byed chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po la bltos nas chung du dang 'bring dang chen por 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par rig byed chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po la bltos nas chung du dang 'bring dang chen por 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Nonindicative form does not become small, medium or large in dependence on small, medium or large indicative form.

original: snga ma las gzhan du skye ba la 'dir gyur par dgongs pas na 'di ni klan ka ma yin no //
analyzed: snga ma las gzhan du skye ba la 'dir gyur par dgongs pas na 'di ni klan ka ma yin no //
translated: But it is derived from the prior state of the primary elements that are its basis, since it is derived from that which is transformed.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:🔽It is form because it exists as form in the primary elements that are its basis.

original: rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen bya ba ste /
analyzed: rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir zhes zer ro zhes bya ba ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen bya ba ste /
translated: This is the opinion of Master Vasubandhu.

original: sngon po la sogs pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'byung ba la brten pa na /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'byung ba la brten pa na /
translated: When form derived from the primary elements such as blue exists in the primary elements, it is called form.

original: 'byung ba dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig par mthong ste de'i phyir rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin pas 'di yang rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs su rung ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig par mthong ste de'i phyir rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin pas 'di yang rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs su rung ba'o //
translated: Since it exists as form in the primary elements that are its support, it is suitable as form.🔽Since it is impeded, it is derivative form.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyur @59b byas pa'i gzugs gzhan gzugs su yod pa dngos su khas blangs pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyur @59b byas pa'i gzugs gzhan gzugs su yod pa dngos su khas blangs pa'i phyir la /
translated: Since it exists as form in another derivative form, it is directly accepted.

original: 'di ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir rten gyi sgo kho na nas gzugs su rung ba yin no zhes so //🔽de lta na 'on ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag kyang zhes rgya cher 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'di ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir rten gyi sgo kho na nas gzugs su rung ba yin no zhes so // de lta na 'on ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag kyang zhes rgya cher 'byung ste /
translated: But it is suitable as form only in terms of its support, because it is not impeded.🔽If that is so, then the eye consciousness and so on would also be suitable as form, because they exist as form in the primary elements that are their support.

original: de rnams kyi rten mig la sogs pa dag ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rten mig la sogs pa dag ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes so //
translated: The eye and so on are impeded, but the eye consciousness and so on are not impeded.

original: de nyid thal ba'i sgo nas 'khrul par ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid thal ba'i sgo nas 'khrul par ston par byed do //
translated: This is the error that arises from the consequence.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: rten 'byung ba gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs nyid du bshad pa la /
analyzed: rten 'byung ba gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs nyid du bshad pa la /
translated: It is explained as form because its support, the primary elements, exist as form.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams la thal ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams la thal ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the consequence for the eye consciousnesses, etc.?

original: de dag gi rten 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: de dag gi rten 'byung ba med do //
translated: Their support, the elements, do not exist.

original: 'dir ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i rten gyi sgo nas rnam par rig byed ma yin ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i rten gyi sgo nas rnam par rig byed ma yin ba nyid do //
translated: Here, noninformative form is not supported by the elements, but by the body that possesses resistance.

original: gzugs nyid 'dod pa 'byung ba rten ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs nyid 'dod pa 'byung ba rten ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since form itself is not the support of the elements,

original: des na mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams la thal ba'o //
analyzed: des na mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams la thal ba'o //
translated: the consequence is that the eye consciousnesses, etc.,🔽are not supported by the elements.

original: nye bar bkod pa 'di ni mi mthun pa yin te zhes bya ba ni de nyid la la na smra'o //
analyzed: nye bar bkod pa 'di ni mi mthun pa yin te zhes bya ba ni de nyid la la na smra'o //
translated: This example is not similar,

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni ljon pa la grib ma nyid ces bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni ljon pa la grib ma nyid ces bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste /
translated: Noninformative form is like the shade of a tree.

original: ji ltar shing ljon ba dang grib ma dag dang nor bu dang 'od dag grub pa dang bde ba dang gcig pa de bzhin du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang 'byung ba dag grub ba dang bde ba gcig go snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar shing ljon ba dang grib ma dag dang nor bu dang 'od dag grub pa dang bde ba dang gcig pa de bzhin du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang 'byung ba dag grub ba dang bde ba gcig go snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Just as a tree and its shade are established and located in the same place, so too noninformative form and the primary elements are established and located in the same place.

original: mig gi rnam bar shes ba la sogs ba dag ni mig la sogs pa dang de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam bar shes ba la sogs ba dag ni mig la sogs pa dang de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: Eye consciousness and so on are not like that.

original: de dag ni de dag gi skye ba'i rgyu tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad pa'i byir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni de dag gi skye ba'i rgyu tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad pa'i byir ro //
translated: They are merely the cause of their generation.

original: 'di ni re zhig bye brag tu smra ba ma yin te zhes bya ba la shing ljon pa la brten nas grib ma dang zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig bye brag tu smra ba ma yin te zhes bya ba la shing ljon pa la brten nas grib ma dang zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o //
translated: This is not the Vaibhashika position.

original: ci ltar bye brag tu smra pa'i ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar bye brag tu smra pa'i ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not the Vaibhashika position?

original: grib ma la sogs pa kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grib ma la sogs pa kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Vaibhashika position is that shadow and so on are subtle particles of form.

original: de la grib ma dang 'od ces bya ba ni kha dog gi gzugs kho na la /
analyzed: de la grib ma dang 'od ces bya ba ni kha dog gi gzugs kho na la /
translated: Shadow and light are form that is color.

original: kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams ni rang gi 'byung ba bzhi chen la brten pa'i phyir shing ljon pa la sogs bdag gi rten du mi 'dod do //
analyzed: kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams ni rang gi 'byung ba bzhi chen la brten pa'i phyir shing ljon pa la sogs bdag gi rten du mi 'dod do //
translated: The subtle particles of color do not rely on trees and so on as their support because they rely on the four great elements that are their own support.

original: grib ma dang 'od kyi rdul phra rab rnams kyi 'byung ba rnams ni shing ljon pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyu ste de skyang ba dang gnas pa dang gyur ba'i rjes su 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i rgyu dang rten skyed pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu dang @60a *
analyzed: grib ma dang 'od kyi rdul phra rab rnams kyi 'byung ba rnams ni shing ljon pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyu ste de skyang ba dang gnas pa dang gyur ba'i rjes su 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i rgyu dang rten skyed pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu dang @60a *
translated: The primary elements of the subtle particles of shadow and light are the primary elements of the tree, because they arise, endure and cease following the arising, enduring and ceasing of the tree. They are the generating and supporting cause and the cause that generates and subsequently engages.

original: // gnas par gyur pa dang mthun par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: // gnas par gyur pa dang mthun par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are the cause that generates and subsequently engages, because they are established in accordance with the endurance and transformation of the tree.

original: de'i grib cha la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rang gi 'byung ba rnams nyid rten skyed ba'i phyir shing ljon pa brten pa ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i grib cha la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rang gi 'byung ba rnams nyid rten skyed ba'i phyir shing ljon pa brten pa ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The primary elements of the subtle particles of shadow and so on are not the tree, because they are not the generating and supporting cause of the tree.

original: de'i phyir 'di nyid bye brag tu smra ba'i ma yin zhes pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di nyid bye brag tu smra ba'i ma yin zhes pa //
translated: Therefore this is not the Vaibhashika system.

original: gzhan dag ni kha dog dang dbyibs ni kha dog la sogs pa'i spyi'am kun btags pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni kha dog dang dbyibs ni kha dog la sogs pa'i spyi'am kun btags pa'o //
translated: Others say: Color and shape are the general or imputed color and so on of the tree.

original: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs tsam kho nar bden pa bye brag tu smra ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs bar mngon par brten nas lus rab tu dbye ba bye brag tu smra ba 'dod do //
analyzed: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs tsam kho nar bden pa bye brag tu smra ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs bar mngon par brten nas lus rab tu dbye ba bye brag tu smra ba 'dod do //
translated: Vaibhasikas assert that the body is distinguished by the mere specific colors and shapes of the body, not by the general characteristics of the body.

original: ci ste bdog la sogs pa'i spyi nyid kho na yang bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi ma yin te de ni btags par yod pas bye brag tu smra ba rnams rgyu nyid du khas mi len no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
analyzed: ci ste bdog la sogs pa'i spyi nyid kho na yang bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi ma yin te de ni btags par yod pas bye brag tu smra ba rnams rgyu nyid du khas mi len no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
translated: Others say that Vaibhasikas do not assert that the general characteristics of the body such as its possession exist as real things, because they are imputedly existent and Vaibhasikas do not accept imputations as causes.

original: slob dpon 'dus bzang na re /
analyzed: slob dpon 'dus bzang na re /
translated: Master Samghabhadra says:

original: grib ma zhes bya ba kha dog mtha' dag gi spyi la gzung gi kha dog nyid pa ni ma yin te shing ljon pa bzhin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: grib ma zhes bya ba kha dog mtha' dag gi spyi la gzung gi kha dog nyid pa ni ma yin te shing ljon pa bzhin no zhes zer ro //
translated: The term shadow refers to the general characteristic of all colors, not to color itself, just as it is said of a tree.

original: de ltar gnyis po dag kyang btags par yod pa'i rten dang brten pa'i ngo bos h'i yi ste /
analyzed: de ltar gnyis po dag kyang btags par yod pa'i rten dang brten pa'i ngo bos h'i yi ste /
translated: Thus both are imputedly existent, since they are the basis and the dependent.

original: rdzas kyi rten dang brten pa'i ngo bor khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas kyi rten dang brten pa'i ngo bor khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But they are not accepted as the substantial basis and the dependent.

original: da lta yin dang 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba la brten pa rnams dang / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la brten pa rnams bya ba de rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da lta yin dang 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba la brten pa rnams dang / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la brten pa rnams bya ba de rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would follow that those that exist now, those that arise, those that depend on the primary elements, and those that depend on derivative form would perform those actions.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la brten cing zhes pa yod kyang gzugs la brten pa nyid ces pa ljon shing dang nor bu la brten pa nyid ces 'brel dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la brten cing zhes pa yod kyang gzugs la brten pa nyid ces pa ljon shing dang nor bu la brten pa nyid ces 'brel dang sbyar ro //
translated: Although it is said that derivative form also depends on derivative form, the phrase “that which depends on form” is connected to the phrase “that which depends on trees and jewels.”

original: grib ma dang 'od ni rang gi 'byung ba la brten te de'i rjes su byed ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grib ma dang 'od ni rang gi 'byung ba la brten te de'i rjes su byed ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Shadow and light depend on their own primary elements because they conform to them.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang zhes bya ba la /
translated: Although the primary elements that are the basis of imperceptible form cease,

original: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i rgyu las byung //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i rgyu las byung //
translated: imperceptible form that arises in the desire realm arises from past causes for more than one instant.

original: zhes gsungs ba'i phyir rten gyi 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang rnam par rig byed ma'i nas rjes su 'jug pa yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes gsungs ba'i phyir rten gyi 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang rnam par rig byed ma'i nas rjes su 'jug pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, although the primary elements that are its basis cease, imperceptible form continues to arise from them.

original: grib ma dang 'od dag ni de ltar rten 'gags kyang mi 'gag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: grib ma dang 'od dag ni de ltar rten 'gags kyang mi 'gag pa ma yin no //
translated: But the shadow and the light do not cease when the tree ceases.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de lan ma yin no //🔽aa bh'u te ra sa ma n+y'a ga ta by'a tsa bi dzny'a bhi rast'e tya sambandha me ti nni ru dhya te te sh'a sya bi dzny'a bti slob dpon @60b 'dus bzang zer ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de lan ma yin no // aa bh'u te ra sa ma n+y'a ga ta by'a tsa bi dzny'a bhi rast'e tya sambandha me ti nni ru dhya te te sh'a sya bi dzny'a bti slob dpon @60b 'dus bzang zer ro //
translated: Therefore, the example of the shadow and the tree is not appropriate.🔽The master Samantabhadra says: “The example of the shadow and the tree is not appropriate because the shadow and the tree are related as cause and effect, but the noninformative and the primary elements are not related in that way.”

original: gzhan dag ni skyed byed kyi 'byung ba rnams rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten du 'dod do //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni skyed byed kyi 'byung ba rnams rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten du 'dod do //
translated: Others assert that the primary elements that produce the noninformative are its basis.

original: cig shos ni 'brel ba med pas 'di'i rten yin no //
analyzed: cig shos ni 'brel ba med pas 'di'i rten yin no //
translated: The other master says that they are not related, so they are not its basis.

original: gzhan dag gis ni 'di la zhes pa ni slob dpon nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ni 'di la zhes pa ni slob dpon nyid de /
translated: The master himself says, “Others say this,”

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di la'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di la'o //
translated: referring to the consequence that visual consciousness and so on would become form.

original: 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te gal te rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ltar gal te gzugs nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te gal te rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ltar gal te gzugs nyid yin na ni /
translated: This is the explanation: If the eye consciousness, etc., were form because their support is form, like non-revealing form,

original: de lta na de'i rten gzugs su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig gzugs nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur na gcig la chos phan tshun 'gal ba 'du ba yang ma yin te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de lta na de'i rten gzugs su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig gzugs nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur na gcig la chos phan tshun 'gal ba 'du ba yang ma yin te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bzhin no //
translated: then, since their support would not be form, some would not be form. But it is not possible for mutually exclusive properties to coexist in one thing, like permanence and impermanence.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de ltar rten tha dad du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de ltar rten tha dad du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: Non-revealing form does not have a different support.

original: 'o na ci zhe na thams cad gzugs su yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na thams cad gzugs su yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But all is not form.

original: de lta bas na 'dra bar thal ba med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi nyid la 'byung ba rnams su yang thal ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dra bar thal ba med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi nyid la 'byung ba rnams su yang thal ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the consequence of similarity does not apply. The defining characteristics of others occur in the basis of characteristics itself.

original: de ltar gzhan gyi 'byung ba'i gzugs rnams kyi snga ma la sogs pa bzhin du rnam par rig byed ma yin zhes pa rjes su dpag pa'i gzugs nyid du gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyi 'byung ba'i gzugs rnams kyi snga ma la sogs pa bzhin du rnam par rig byed ma yin zhes pa rjes su dpag pa'i gzugs nyid du gsungs te /
translated: Nonindicative form is said to be inferred form, like the prior state of the form of others.

original: lus dang ngag gi las nyid kyi phyir dang rnam par rig byed bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung pos ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi las nyid kyi phyir dang rnam par rig byed bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung pos ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not subsumed by the aggregates of feeling and so on, like indicative form, because it is the action of body and speech.

original: 'di rang kho na'i gzugs nyid las mtshan nyid gzhan ma yin pas zhes so //
analyzed: 'di rang kho na'i gzugs nyid las mtshan nyid gzhan ma yin pas zhes so //
translated: It is not a different type from form alone, since it does not have a different characteristic.

original: 'di'i nges pa'i tshig tsam yang gzugs rung bas gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya ste mtshan nyid la brten nas khyad par du ma byas pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs su rung bas gzugs nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur
analyzed: 'di'i nges pa'i tshig tsam yang gzugs rung bas gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya ste mtshan nyid la brten nas khyad par du ma byas pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs su rung bas gzugs nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur
translated: It is called the appropriated aggregate of form because it is suitable to be form. It is not a mere synonym, since it is not a specific type based on its characteristics. It is not the case that form is form alone, since it is the basis of eye consciousness and so on.

original: ro zhes pa slob dpon gyi len mngon par brjod pa mi rigs pa la brten pa'i spyi bzung nas nges par gzung ba'i phyir dang go skabs med par len mngon par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ro zhes pa slob dpon gyi len mngon par brjod pa mi rigs pa la brten pa'i spyi bzung nas nges par gzung ba'i phyir dang go skabs med par len mngon par brjod pa'o //
translated: The word “also” is for the purpose of including the general sense of the master’s statement that it is illogical to describe the sense faculties as form and for the purpose of describing the sense faculties without exception.

original: gzhan dag na re mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs su rung bas gzugs nyid du thal ba med do //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs su rung bas gzugs nyid du thal ba med do //
translated: Others say that it is not a logical fallacy that the form that is the basis of eye consciousness, etc., is form.

original: de'i rigs las gzhan du na rnam par shes pa dngos por yod pa gzugs la mi ltos pa'o zhes zer ro //🔽phung po rnam par gzhag pa'i @61a * //
analyzed: de'i rigs las gzhan du na rnam par shes pa dngos por yod pa gzugs la mi ltos pa'o zhes zer ro // phung po rnam par gzhag pa'i @61a * //
translated: They say that consciousness, which is a different type from form, exists as a thing without depending on form.🔽The order of the aggregates is stated in terms of their coarseness, order of teaching, order of defilement, order of the womb, and order of cause and effect.🔽The order of the elements and bases is stated in terms of the order of the elements and bases.

original: mjug thogs su khams dang skye mched rnam par gzhag par rigs pa la de las brgal te tshor ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma brjod ba nyid du gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mjug thogs su khams dang skye mched rnam par gzhag par rigs pa la de las brgal te tshor ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma brjod ba nyid du gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The order of the aggregates is stated in terms of their coarseness, order of teaching, order of defilement, order of the womb, and order of cause and effect.

original: dbang don de dag kho na la skye mched dang khams bcur 'dod ces rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: dbang don de dag kho na la skye mched dang khams bcur 'dod ces rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: The ten bases and ten elements are asserted to be just those objects of the faculties.

original: de'i skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa med pas 'di lhag ma dang bcas ba ste rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin🔽no zhes bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa med pas 'di lhag ma dang bcas ba ste rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The presentation of the faculties and elements is not a presentation of nonindicative form. Therefore this is incomplete, because it does not teach that nonindicative form exists at all.

original: tshor ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni /🔽'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni / 'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
translated: The remaining topics to be explained are feeling and so on.🔽The Abhidharmakosa states,🔽Those conditioned phenomena are the five aggregates

original: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //
translated: such as form.

original: zhes brjod pa de la gzugs kyi phung po bshad zin nas da ni tshor ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa de la gzugs kyi phung po bshad zin nas da ni tshor ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhes pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of form has already been explained. Now the remaining aggregates of feeling and so on will be explained.

original: tshor myong ba zhes bya ba la nyams su myong bas na myong ba'o //
analyzed: tshor myong ba zhes bya ba la nyams su myong bas na myong ba'o //
translated: Feeling is the experience of contact.

original: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo sim pa dang nye bar gdung ba dang rnam pa de gnyis ka las rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo sim pa dang nye bar gdung ba dang rnam pa de gnyis ka las rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: The experience of the nature of things is the direct realization of the nature of things, which is free from both the aspect of satisfaction and the aspect of dissatisfaction.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin sim pa dang yongs su gdung ba dang rnam pa gnyis ka las grol ba'i nyams su myong par byed pas kyang nyams su myong ba ste /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin sim pa dang yongs su gdung ba dang rnam pa gnyis ka las grol ba'i nyams su myong par byed pas kyang nyams su myong ba ste /
translated: The experience of the nature of things is the experience of the nature of things, which is free from both the aspect of satisfaction and the aspect of dissatisfaction.

original: de yang rang bzhin gyi dbye ba las rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gyi dbye ba las rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold, according to the differentiation of natures.

original: de la lus dang sems 'phel bar 'jug pa ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: de la lus dang sems 'phel bar 'jug pa ni bde ba'o //
translated: Among them, the pleasant is that which engages in the increase of body and mind.

original: 'grib par 'jug pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'grib par 'jug pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: The unpleasant is that which engages in the decrease of body and mind.

original: gang zhig gnyis ka yang mi 'jug la yod pa'i myong ba de ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa ste gnag pa yang ma yin dkar ba yang ma yin pa'i las bzhin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gnyis ka yang mi 'jug la yod pa'i myong ba de ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa ste gnag pa yang ma yin dkar ba yang ma yin pa'i las bzhin no //
translated: That which engages in neither is the experience of the existence of the neutral, which is neither pleasant nor unpleasant, like karma that is neither black nor white.

original: rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa drug ste mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa gsum tshogs pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa drug ste mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa gsum tshogs pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa yin la /
translated: From the point of view of their cause, there are six types of contact: contact consisting of the union of the three, eye, visible form, and visual consciousness;

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba yang rig par bya'o //
translated: and so on up to contact consisting of the union of the three, mind, mental object, and mental consciousness.

original: tshor ba nyams su myong ba ni reg pa'i yin no zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
analyzed: tshor ba nyams su myong ba ni reg pa'i yin no zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
translated: The master Samghapala says: The experience of feeling is contact.

original: gang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa gnyi ga las bzlog pa'i reg pa nyams su myong ba las de tshor ba ste /
analyzed: gang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa gnyi ga las bzlog pa'i reg pa nyams su myong ba las de tshor ba ste /
translated: The experience of feeling that is the opposite of both desirable and undesirable is contact.

original: de ltar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i tshor ba dang zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs @61b so ;
analyzed: de ltar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i tshor ba dang zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs @61b so ;
translated: Thus, the sutra says: “Contact that is conducive to the experience of pleasant feeling” and so on.

original: / bde ba'i tshor ba skyed pa nyid de la phan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / bde ba'i tshor ba skyed pa nyid de la phan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Contact that generates pleasant feeling is beneficial.

original: gal te yul nyams su myong ba las tshor bar 'gyur na dmigs pa gcig pa rnams la 'di'i khyad par ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yul nyams su myong ba las tshor bar 'gyur na dmigs pa gcig pa rnams la 'di'i khyad par ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If feeling arises from the experience of an object, what is the difference between the three that have the same focal object?

original: de'i phyir reg pa nyams su myong bas tshor ba'o zhes rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir reg pa nyams su myong bas tshor ba'o zhes rnam par gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, feeling is the experience of contact.

original: de ltar na 'du shes dang mos pa dang dran pa dang shes rab la sogs pa rnams kyang dmigs pa'i sgo nas tshor bzhin te rang bzhin las brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'du shes dang mos pa dang dran pa dang shes rab la sogs pa rnams kyang dmigs pa'i sgo nas tshor bzhin te rang bzhin las brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Thus, perception, intention, memory, understanding, etc., are also like feeling in that they are described in terms of their objects, not in terms of their intrinsic natures.

original: 'on te dmigs pa gcig pa rnams la mtshan mar 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'du shes la sogs pa rnams dang khyad par 'dod na /🔽tshor ba yang yul nyams su myong bas ci ste mi 'dod ;
analyzed: 'on te dmigs pa gcig pa rnams la mtshan mar 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'du shes la sogs pa rnams dang khyad par 'dod na / tshor ba yang yul nyams su myong bas ci ste mi 'dod ;
translated: If you maintain that perception, etc., are distinguished from one another by their specific activities of apprehending an aspect, etc., even though they have the same object,🔽why do you not maintain that feeling is also distinguished by its specific activity of experiencing an object?

original: reg pa nyams su myong ba yang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo'am dmigs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: reg pa nyams su myong ba yang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo'am dmigs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The experience of contact is either the cause of feeling or it arises from the object of contact.

original: de las de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba thams cad rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i khyad par las ma yin yang rgyur gyur pa'i sems las byung ba thams cad reg pa'i rgyur med pa'i phyir 'jig rten dang bstan bcos las kyang nyams su
analyzed: de las de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba thams cad rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i khyad par las ma yin yang rgyur gyur pa'i sems las byung ba thams cad reg pa'i rgyur med pa'i phyir 'jig rten dang bstan bcos las kyang nyams su
translated: All mental factors concomitant with that contact are concomitant with that contact, but not all mental factors concomitant with the mind are contact because not all mental factors that are causes of the mind are causes of contact.

original: myong ba'i sgra 'bras bu'am rgyur rab tu grags pa med do //
analyzed: myong ba'i sgra 'bras bu'am rgyur rab tu grags pa med do //
translated: Therefore the terms result and cause are not well known in the world or in treatises to refer to feeling.

original: rab tu grags pa ni mngon du byas pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rab tu grags pa ni mngon du byas pa ma yin pas so //
translated: They are not well known because they are not directly perceived.

original: yang ci ltar bde ba dang sdug bsngal las tha dad pa'i gsum pa bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i nyams su myong ba yod ngo zhes shes par bya zhe na lung dang rigs pa las te /
analyzed: yang ci ltar bde ba dang sdug bsngal las tha dad pa'i gsum pa bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i nyams su myong ba yod ngo zhes shes par bya zhe na lung dang rigs pa las te /
translated: How is the existence of the experience of neither pleasure nor pain, which is a third state distinct from pleasure and pain, to be understood? It is to be understood from scripture and logic.

original: gang gi phyir mdo las bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs te bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin zhes tshor ba rnam pa gsum gsungs pa dang / rig pa ni tshor ba dang bral ba'i sems skye ba med pa'i phyir dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mdo las bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs te bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin zhes tshor ba rnam pa gsum gsungs pa dang / rig pa ni tshor ba dang bral ba'i sems skye ba med pa'i phyir dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i sems dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
translated: Because in the sutra, three kinds of feelings are mentioned: pleasant, unpleasant, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant. And because there is no awareness of a mind free from pleasant and unpleasant feelings.

original: 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba la mtshan ni khyad par te bdag dang rang bzhin dang rang gi ngo bo zhes pa rnams rnam grangs so //
analyzed: 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba la mtshan ni khyad par te bdag dang rang bzhin dang rang gi ngo bo zhes pa rnams rnam grangs so //
translated: Discrimination has the nature of apprehending signs. A sign is a distinguishing mark, and self, nature, and own-nature are synonyms.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: khyad par 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: khyad par 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of apprehending a distinguishing mark.

original: zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is what is said.

original: chos dang sems can dang rnam par rtog pa'i gnas la 'jug pa'i phyir 'du shes te 'di tsam zhig dper brjod do //
analyzed: chos dang sems can dang rnam par rtog pa'i gnas la 'jug pa'i phyir 'du shes te 'di tsam zhig dper brjod do //
translated: Discrimination is the engagement in the bases of phenomena, sentient beings, and conceptualization. This much is the example.

original: yang na sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang rten skyes pa dang bud @62a * //🔽med du rnam par rtog pa dang skyes pa'i rten la mdza' bo dang dgrar rnam par rtog pa dang de dag gi rten la rab tu sbyor ba ji lta bar bde ba dang sdug bsngal du 'dzin pa ste de lta bu la sogs pa sgra dang sgra la
analyzed: yang na sngon po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang rten skyes pa dang bud @62a * // med du rnam par rtog pa dang skyes pa'i rten la mdza' bo dang dgrar rnam par rtog pa dang de dag gi rten la rab tu sbyor ba ji lta bar bde ba dang sdug bsngal du 'dzin pa ste de lta bu la sogs pa sgra dang sgra la
translated: Or else, it is the discrimination of color and shape such as blue, etc. , and the discrimination of the support as male or female.🔽It is the discrimination of friend and foe in relation to the support of the male, and the discrimination of the application in relation to the support of both.

original: mngon par zhen cing khyad par du 'dzin pa la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen cing khyad par du 'dzin pa la brjod par bya'o //
translated: It is the discrimination of pleasure and pain, etc. , in relation to sound and sound-source.

original: de'i phyir 'di dag gi go rims de lta bu'o //🔽tshor ba bzhin zhes bya ba la dper na tshor ba'i phung po rten gyi dbye bas drug tu phye ba de bzhin du 'du shes kyi phung po yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag gi go rims de lta bu'o // tshor ba bzhin zhes bya ba la dper na tshor ba'i phung po rten gyi dbye bas drug tu phye ba de bzhin du 'du shes kyi phung po yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
translated: This is how it should be understood.🔽Like feeling, just as the aggregate of feeling is divided into six by way of the differentiation of the basis, so too the aggregate of perception is divided into six, beginning with perception arising from eye-contact and ending with

original: 'du shes zhes bya ba'i bar drug tu dbye'o //
analyzed: 'du shes zhes bya ba'i bar drug tu dbye'o //
translated: perception arising from mind-contact.

original: tshogs kyi sgra ni re re zhing rdzas du ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs kyi sgra ni re re zhing rdzas du ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The term “collection” should be understood to refer to many substances.

original: gal te yul gyi khyad par 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni thogs ba'i reg pa rnam par rtog pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan par ji ltar rung zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yul gyi khyad par 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni thogs ba'i reg pa rnam par rtog pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan par ji ltar rung zhe na /
translated: If conceptual thought apprehends the specific characteristics of an object, how could it be associated with nonconceptual contact that impedes?

original: 'du shes ni sa mang po ba yin pa'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan te thogs pa'i reg pa dang ldan pa ni g-yeng ba'i phyir bdag ma yin zhes pas na de la bya ba mngon par gsal bar mi
analyzed: 'du shes ni sa mang po ba yin pa'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan te thogs pa'i reg pa dang ldan pa ni g-yeng ba'i phyir bdag ma yin zhes pas na de la bya ba mngon par gsal bar mi
translated: Since ideation is a universal mental factor, it is associated with all consciousnesses, like feeling. Since contact that impedes is not a self, it is not clear in that action, because it is distracted.

original: 'gyur gyi g-yeng ba'i phyir tshig bla dags kyi reg pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni de'i bya ba mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'gyur gyi g-yeng ba'i phyir tshig bla dags kyi reg pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni de'i bya ba mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro //
translated: Therefore, the action of ideation is clear in contact that is designated as contact associated with distraction. This is the difference.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dus su mtshan mar ma bzung bar ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas nges par rtogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dus su mtshan mar ma bzung bar ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas nges par rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: When the eye consciousness arises, if the object is not grasped as a sign, it cannot be ascertained by the mental consciousness.

original: de'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du 'du shes kyang 'dus te reg pa tha dad pa la tha dad par mi 'gal lo //🔽'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du 'du shes kyang 'dus te reg pa tha dad pa la tha dad par mi 'gal lo // 'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan //
translated: Therefore, like feeling, discrimination also does not contradict being different from the different contact.🔽The formation heap is that which is associated and not associated with the four heaps other than consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba las gang ji skad du bshad pa gsum dang 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po las gzhan pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed de dag ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba las gang ji skad du bshad pa gsum dang 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po las gzhan pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed de dag ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: The formation heap is the formations that are associated and not associated with the four heaps other than those three that are explained in the above verse and the consciousness heap that will be explained.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma bstan par bzhi las gzhan ces brjod pa ci ltar yin zhe na /🔽'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma bstan par bzhi las gzhan ces brjod pa ci ltar yin zhe na / 'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
translated: If the consciousness heap is not explained, how can it be said that the formations are other than the four?

original: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //
translated: Those conditioned phenomena are the five heaps of form and so on.

original: zhes sngar nyid du rnam par shes pa bstan zin pas nyes pa 'di med do //
analyzed: zhes sngar nyid du rnam par shes pa bstan zin pas nyes pa 'di med do //
translated: Since consciousness was already explained above, this error does not occur.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lung dang 'gal ba spong bar byed do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lung dang 'gal ba spong bar byed do //
translated: and so on. This is to reject the contradiction with scripture.

original: mdo las ni 'du byed kyi phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: mdo las ni 'du byed kyi phung po gang zhe na /
translated: In the sūtra, it says, What is the aggregate of formation?

original: sems pa'i tshogs drug go zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: sems pa'i tshogs drug go zhes gsungs la /
translated: It is the six collections of intention.

original: kha @62b cig mdo 'di la brten nas 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems kho na yin no snyam du sems te de dag la mdo 'di dgongs pa can yin no snyam du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kha @62b cig mdo 'di la brten nas 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems kho na yin no snyam du sems te de dag la mdo 'di dgongs pa can yin no snyam du shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Some think that based on this sūtra, the aggregate of formation is only mind. To make them understand that this sūtra has a specific intention,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: the Bhagavān said in the sūtra...

original: yang ci'i phyir sems las byung ba 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus pa gzhan dag kyang yod na sems pa kho na 'du byed kyi phung po nyid du gsungs she na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir sems las byung ba 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus pa gzhan dag kyang yod na sems pa kho na 'du byed kyi phung po nyid du gsungs she na /
translated: Again, why is it that if other mental factors are also included in the aggregate of formation, only intention is said to be the aggregate of formation?

original: de'i phyir gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, Because it is primary.

original: gang dag las gtso bo yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag las gtso bo yin zhe na /
translated: What is primary?

original: de las gzhan 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus par bya ba dang yid la byed pa dang thob pa la sogs pa rnams las so //
analyzed: de las gzhan 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus par bya ba dang yid la byed pa dang thob pa la sogs pa rnams las so //
translated: Other than that, it is included in the aggregate of formations, such as the formative forces that are mental factors, attention, acquisition, etc.

original: lhag ma rnams las de gtso bor gyur pa cis byas pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams las de gtso bor gyur pa cis byas pa zhig ce na /
translated: Why is it the most important of all the remaining ones?

original: de'i phyir bshad pa de ni las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams las mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa de ni las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams las mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no //
translated: It is explained that it is the most important in the performance of the formative forces among those associated with it because it has the nature of karma.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba ni rnam par smin pa 'phen pa yin la de'i dbang gis lhag ma rnam par smin pa 'phen pa'i phyir gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba ni rnam par smin pa 'phen pa yin la de'i dbang gis lhag ma rnam par smin pa 'phen pa'i phyir gtso bo yin no //
translated: The performance of the formative forces is the projection of the result that is karmic maturation and it is the most important because the remaining ones project the result of karmic maturation through its power.

original: gzhan dag na re 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bur gyur cig ces de ltar mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bur gyur cig ces de ltar mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that it is the most important in the performance of the formative forces in the sense that one thinks, “May I become like this or like that.”

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni sems pa mngon par 'du bya ba gtso bo de nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni sems pa mngon par 'du bya ba gtso bo de nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of that alone means because of that alone, i.e., the performance of the formative forces by volition.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed do zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed do zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The Bhagavan extensively declares, “Conditioned states are created by formation.”

original: gal te yang 'dus byas su gyur pa de nyid ji ltar sems pas 'du byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dus byas su gyur pa de nyid ji ltar sems pas 'du byed ce na /
translated: If that which is conditioned were to exist, how could it be created by intention?

original: cung zad cig yod du zin kyang 'bras bu 'phen pa la gtso bo yin pas skye ba dang rjes su mthun par rnam par 'jog par byed pas 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed ces brjod par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: cung zad cig yod du zin kyang 'bras bu 'phen pa la gtso bo yin pas skye ba dang rjes su mthun par rnam par 'jog par byed pas 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed ces brjod par bya'o zhes so //
translated: Even if it were to exist, since it is primary in projecting the effect, it is said to create conditioned states because it establishes them in conformity with arising.

original: kha cig na re 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis yin pa de bzhin du phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'dus byas kyang 'di ltar gyur cig ces de ltar mngon par 'du byed do zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig na re 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis yin pa de bzhin du phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'dus byas kyang 'di ltar gyur cig ces de ltar mngon par 'du byed do zhes so //
translated: Some say: It is like the name of that which will arise. Conditioned states that are characterized by the five aggregates are created by formation through the power of the statement, “May this come to be.”

original: gzhan dag ni gzhan du yang ste reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa sems pa dang mthun par sgrub pa'i phyir 'du byed kyi phung po ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni gzhan du yang ste reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa sems pa dang mthun par sgrub pa'i phyir 'du byed kyi phung po ste /
translated: Others say: The aggregate of formation is different from that because it establishes contact, attention and so on in conformity with intention.

original: gzhan du na 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed pa ni de'i phyir brjod par bya ste zhes pa don med pa can ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed pa ni de'i phyir brjod par bya ste zhes pa don med pa can ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, it would be meaningless to say, “One should speak of the formation of conditioned states because of that.”

original: tshor ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams la mngon par brjod pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gsungs pa @63a * //🔽med pa de'i phyir sems pa kho na 'du byed kyi phung por bstan pa dgongs pa can yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams la mngon par brjod pa 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gsungs pa @63a * // med pa de'i phyir sems pa kho na 'du byed kyi phung por bstan pa dgongs pa can yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The reason for applying the term appropriation to the aggregates of feeling and so on is stated in the sutra:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed de zhes rgya cher 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed de zhes rgya cher 'byung ngo //
translated: “Because of that, the Bhagavān taught that volition alone is the aggregate of formation.”

original: yang na phung po bzhis ma bsdus pa'i 'du byed rnams bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi skye mched dang khams bzhin du 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po'o zhes 'du byed kyi sgras spyir bstan to //
analyzed: yang na phung po bzhis ma bsdus pa'i 'du byed rnams bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi skye mched dang khams bzhin du 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po'o zhes 'du byed kyi sgras spyir bstan to //
translated: This is stated in order to show that the teaching of the aggregate of formation is provisional, because the term formation is also used in general to refer to the formations not included in the four aggregates, just as the phenomena base and phenomena element are.

original: de lta ma yin na tshor ba la sogs pa ltar sems pa'i phung po zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tshor ba la sogs pa ltar sems pa'i phung po zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, it would be called the aggregate of volition, like the aggregate of sensation, etc.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba la gal te sems pa kho na 'dus byas kyi phung po yin gyi /
